title: Positive vs Negative
text: A positive angle means you rotate counterclockwise from the positive x-axis, while a negative angle means you rotate clockwise.

title: Starting Axis
text: When measuring angles in standard position, the angle starts from the positive x-axis. Think about the direction you rotate for positive and negative angles.

title: Clockwise
text: Imagine starting at the positive x-axis. If you rotate counterclockwise, is the angle positive or negative?

title: Counterclockwise
text: Now, imagine rotating clockwise from the positive x-axis. Is this a positive or negative angle?
